intro.title: Welcome to Hosting!
intro.description: Start your journey as a host. We'll guide you through the steps to list your property.
intro.benefit1: Reach guests from around the world
intro.benefit2: Earn extra income on your terms
intro.infoText: You'll provide details about your property, set your preferences, and publish your listing. You can edit everything later!

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.description: Tell us about your property's basic details

description.title: Property Description
description.description: Describe your property to help guests understand what to expect
description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Describe your property, what makes it special, nearby attractions, and what guests can expect during their stay...
description.minLengthWarning: At least {{min}} characters required ({{remaining}} more needed)
description.tipContent: Be descriptive and honest. Mention unique features, nearby attractions, and any important details guests should know.

propertyType.title: Property Type
propertyType.description: Select the type of property you're listing

guestAccess.title: Guest Access
guestAccess.description: Choose how guests will access your property

ENTIRE.label: Entire place
ENTIRE.description: Guests have the whole property to themselves.

PRIVATE.label: Private room
PRIVATE.description: Guests have their own room but share some spaces.

SHARED.label: Shared room
SHARED.description: Guests sleep in a room or area that may be shared with others.

location.title: Location Details
location.description: Provide the exact location of your property

details.title: Share some basics about your place
details.description: You can always change these later
details.detailsHelp: Accurate details help guests know what to expect

title.title: Give your property a title
title.description: Catch guests' attention with a catchy title
title.titleHelp: A great title helps guests find and remember your property
title.tipContent: A great title helps guests find and remember your property. Use descriptive, memorable words and keep it under 32 characters.
title.label: Title

tags.title: Choose tags that describe your place

images.title: Property Photos
images.description: Add high-quality photos to showcase your property
images.tipContent: High-quality photos help guests get a better sense of your property and increase bookings. Use natural lighting and show off your best features.

pricing.title: Set your {{type}} price
pricing.description: Price competitively to attract more bookings
pricing.lowPriceWarning: Consider setting a higher price to ensure quality guests
pricing.competitiveTip: Price competitively to attract more bookings
pricing.priceHelp: Set different prices for weekdays and weekends
pricing.tip: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Research similar properties in your area to set a competitive price

discounts.title: Offer discounts to attract guests
discounts.description: Optional: Increase bookings with strategic discounts
discounts.discountHelp: Discounts can help you attract more bookings

policies.title: Set Default Policies
policies.subtitle: Configure your cancellation policy and house rules
policies.description: These are your default policies. You can customize them for this property.

cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellationPolicy.description: Moderate - Full refund 5 days before arrival

hostInfo.title: Tell us about yourself
hostInfo.subtitle: Complete verification to ensure guest safety and trust
hostInfo.description: Are you listing as an individual or business?

safetyDisclosures.title: Safety disclosures
safetyDisclosures.weaponsOnProperty: Are there any weapons on the property?
safetyDisclosures.securityCameras: Are there security cameras on the property?

infoBox.title: Safety & Legal
infoBox.content: Being transparent about safety features and potential risks helps build trust with guests and ensures compliance with local regulations.

verification.title: Verify Your Account
verification.subtitle: Complete verification to ensure guest safety and trust

agreement.title: Accept Terms & Policies
agreement.subtitle: Review and accept our terms of service and policies

preferences.title: Host Preferences
preferences.subtitle: Set your response time and booking preferences

profile.title: Complete Your Profile
profile.subtitle: Tell guests about yourself and what makes you a great host

review.title: Review & Publish
review.description: Take a final look before publishing your listing
review.updateMessage: Your property listing will be updated with the new information.
review.publishMessage: Your property will be reviewed and published within 24 hours. You can edit these details anytime after publishing.
review.draft: Your property has been saved as a draft
review.publishedMessage: Your property is now live and visible to guests. You can edit it anytime from your dashboard.
review.draftMessage: Your property has been saved as a draft. You can continue editing it later.

success.publishedMessage: Your property has been published successfully and is now visible to guests.
success.draftMessage: Your property has been saved as a draft. You can continue editing it later.

draftSelection.savedProperties: You have saved properties in progress. Choose one to continue or start fresh.
